attributes.title: 2022 Kia Rio 1.4 Tec 5-dr

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.title: 2020 Toyota Prado 3.0 D VX-L Auto

attributes.description: WHAT A VEHICLE, THIS IS MOST DEFINETLY THE ONLY RAV4 VX AUTOMATIC AVAILABLE IN THIS CONDITION. ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION. Only two responsible owners since new. Full service history, every single service completed on schedule and up to date, including service recently completed with Toyota, which equals 100 percent peace mind motoring. Arctic white, black leather upholstery in excellent condition and finished with VX trim. Loaded with all the standard extras and additional VX extras including Multifunctional leather steering wheel, Keyless entry, Spare wheel carrier, Park distance control, VX light alloy wheels, Automatic Xenon headlights, Auto armor safety smash and grab tinted windows etc. etc. 4 PERELLI SCORPION ATR TYRES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. Carefully looked after and maintained by TOYOTA fanatic. The only reason for selling, he bought a TOYOTA PRADO. Every now and then, we do get a GEM in this condition, if you are looking for a SUV then you must look at this one. BY FAR THE BEST VALUED VX AUTO AVAILABLE IN THIS CONDITION. Must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FORV INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
